com.algodeal.marketrunner.strategies
Interface MetaStrategyEvents

All Known Implementing Classes:
com.algodeal.marketrunner.runner.AbstractBaseMetaStrategy, AbstractMetaStrategy, com.algodeal.marketrunner.runner.AbstractPublicMetaStrategy
public interface MetaStrategyEvents

Method Summary
 void createStrategies()
          Called before the backtest begins to let the user create the basics strategies that combose this meta-strategy.
 

Method Detail

createStrategies

void createStrategies()
Called before the backtest begins to let the user create the basics strategies that combose this meta-strategy. Typically, by calling AbstractPublicMetaStrategy.addStrategy(com.algodeal.marketrunner.strategies.AbstractStrategy, com.algodeal.marketData.instruments.Instrument, com.algodeal.marketrunner.strategies.BarType) multiple times.
